scenario_text.value:
Hold on, Takuma! That one just popped out of
the underbrush!

(It looks pissed... Or maybe it’s trying to
threaten us.)

(Is there some way to convey that there’s no
need to be scared?)

We don’t want to fight! There’s no need to
resort to violence!
(No good... Looks like it’s lost its head.)
Damn, guess we have to fight!

You don’t need to be scared. We have no
intention of harming you.
Yeah, we mean it. Here, come with us.

There’s lots of guys like us with Takuma’s
friends!
Really?! Then I’ll come with you!
(*whew* We didn’t have to fight, after all.)
